Metadata.title: Oddle Restaurant Growth Platform
Metadata.description: Empowering restaurants worldwide to grow their business with online ordering, reservations, CRM, and marketing tools.
Metadata.keywords: restaurant software, online ordering, reservation system, restaurant CRM, F&B technology, Oddle

reservation-system.title: Reservation System
reservation-system.desc: Drive direct reservations and optimise capacity.

online-ordering-system.title: Online Ordering System
online-ordering-system.desc: Take commission-free orders on your own website.

loyalty-program.title: Loyalty Program
loyalty-program.desc: Retain customers and grow repeat sales.

payment-terminal.title: Payment Terminal
payment-terminal.desc: Integrated payments for dine-in and online orders.

virtual-lounge.title: Virtual Lounge
virtual-lounge.desc: Engage guests and upsell while they wait.

survey-tool.title: Survey Tool
survey-tool.desc: Gather feedback and improve guest satisfaction.

email-marketing-system.title: Email Marketing System
email-marketing-system.desc: Automate campaigns to drive repeat visits.

crm-customer-intelligence.title: CRM & Customer Intelligence
crm-customer-intelligence.desc: Understand your guests and personalize experiences.

oddle-eats-network.title: Oddle Eats Network
oddle-eats-network.desc: Reach more diners on our food discovery platform.
